title: ATLAS - PROVIDE RESULTS OF EOS REPORTS
time_sequence: GN - ATLAS PHASE 5.3 - PROCESSING AFTER STAR 1

task_list.instruction_title:
Please provide results of controls below:

C0060 E35I : List of fiduciary placements
C0070 EW29 - APTF Subtotals by currency
C0210 EYY4 : Term deposits by currency to deliver
C0800 EFUJ: List of SGPBCH client - type client
C0820 EFUK: List of SGPBCH clients - manager code
C0990 EFV1: List of clients positions securities
C0992 EFVA: State of securities positions different than 0
C1040 E41G/E41K: movements on current accounts, daily/weekly
C1042 EYY6 / EYY7 : List forex exchange
C1044E54Q: negative (debit) account without pledges
C1046 EB31/EB32/EB09: List on investements
C1048 E50Q: credit overflow
C1050 EJ09: Perfomances in anomaly
C1052 E51Q/E52Q/E53Q: List of credit overflow
C1056 EJ15: List of current account opened automatically
C1058 E04Z: List of cash operation / buy-sell of notes
C2440 Statements printing (quantity per society to be defined) from SGPBCH and UBP to validate:asset amounts, performances, PMA
